rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey Zeke, Saika.
You got a moment?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0002
rows.name:
Sure, what's up?
You're not usually the type
to start a serious discussion.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0003
rows.name: Well y'see, it's about Turters...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0004
rows.name: Turters?!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0005
rows.name:
Sorry, but Turters is our mascot.
I know he's the cutest little chap in
the world, but you can't have him.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0006
rows.name:
You heard the Prince.
If you ask nicely, we might allow
you to pat him on the head...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0007
rows.name: Uh-huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0008
rows.name:
Thanks for confirming what
I already guessed.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0009
rows.name:
You haven't even noticed, have you?
He's been crawling into my bed
every night.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0010
rows.name: H-he's been what?!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0011
rows.name:
If I'm not super careful, I worry I'm
going to crush the little guy in my sleep.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0012
rows.name:
But like you say, he's your
precious little mascot, yeah?
I figured you'd be mad if I hurt him.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0013
rows.name:
So it's been keeping me awake
the whole damn night.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, I guess I should apologize
on Turters' behalf.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0015
rows.name:
Honestly, weren't you meant
to be keeping an eye on him?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0016
rows.name:
Hahah! Well, you know me!
Once my head hits the sheets,
I'm out for the count!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0017
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0018
rows.name:
We'd better find a way
to stop him wandering off.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0019
rows.name: What would be a good plan?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0020
rows.name: He could sleep in my bed?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0021
rows.name: Let's flip this whole issue on its head.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0101
rows.name:
Yeah...
That might be the best solution.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0102
rows.name:
He used to sleep in my bed back
in the day, anyway. It'll be fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0103
rows.name:
I guess that settles it.
Thanks, Saika!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0104
rows.name: You can count on me!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0105
rows.name:
Hang on, though. You said he used to
sleep in your bed "back in the day"...
Just how long have you had this turtle?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0106
rows.name:
Oh, it hasn't been as long as me and
old Princey here, but...it's been quite
a while, I think?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0107
rows.name:
Huh. It's just that he's so small.
I always assumed he was pretty
young.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0108
rows.name:
So what would you do if he grew
up to be Byakko-sized?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0109
rows.name:
The things that go through that
head of yours...

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0110
rows.name: Watch it, you.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0111
rows.name:
He wouldn't be quite so portable
if that were to happen.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0112
rows.name:
Right? It got me wondering, would you
guys stick together even then?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0113
rows.name:
Why, I could ride around
on top of Turters instead!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0114
rows.name: You mean, like Nia and Byakko?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0115
rows.name: Yeah. That sounds pretty sweet, right?!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0116
rows.name: You'd probably get left behind. A lot.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0117
rows.name: And how.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0118
rows.name: Yeah, you know what?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0119
rows.name:
I'm just gonna be glad that Turters
stayed this size.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0201
rows.name: Flip it?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0202
rows.name: On its head?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0203
rows.name: Yuh-huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0204
rows.name:
I mean, Turters is one of
the gang too, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0205
rows.name:
So I figure, me and Zeke can't
keep hogging him forever.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0206
rows.name:
He doesn't belong to any one person.
He's a precious mascot, to each and
every one of us.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0207
rows.name:
So what I say is, why don't we all
pitch in on looking after him?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0208
rows.name: Oh, right! Great idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0209
rows.name:
Right? If Nia's helping us out too,
there's no problem with Turters
sleeping in her bed.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0210
rows.name:
Hold it, hold it. This isn't solving the
issue of how I get some sleep.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0211
rows.name:
You can't just lump it all on me.
Get someone else to help.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0212
rows.name:
Hmmm... Maybe Byakko could
look after him?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0213
rows.name:
Could work. He's basically a big fuzzy
pillow.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0214
rows.name: Actually, the same goes for Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0215
rows.name: More like a little fluffy pillow, but yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0216
rows.name:
Hey... Are you two actually just fed up
of taking care of Turters?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0218
rows.name:
Pe-perish the thought!
Right, Saika?

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0219
rows.name:
Yeah, we love Turters. Sometimes
I forget to feed him, but he's great.

rows.label: kizunatalk040_msg0220
rows.name:
I'm starting to understand why he
comes running to me every night...
